name: Push & Pull (RickyManiac)
description:
The inspiration for this game came from the magic from the MISTBORN series.

I am testing this concept to see if it is something that can be developed into a full game, so say what you think in the comments or leave a review.

Controls:

Keyboard & mouse: w,a,s,d,arrows(movement)/space, z(jump,enter)/left-click,x(magnet).

Xbox: left-stick(movement)/ a(jump)/ x(magnet)

pause:(esc/ start)

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RickyManiac
